entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
